-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | QuickCheck instances for various types in the CÎ»aSH Prelude
--   
@package clash-prelude-quickcheck
@version 0.1.1.0

module CLaSH.QuickCheck.Instances.Signal
instance Arbitrary a => Arbitrary (Signal' clk a)

module CLaSH.QuickCheck.Instances.Vec
instance (KnownNat n, Arbitrary a) => Arbitrary (Vec n a)

module CLaSH.QuickCheck.Instances.BitVector
instance KnownNat n => Arbitrary (BitVector n)

module CLaSH.QuickCheck.Instances.BitPack
instance (BitPack (Signed a), KnownNat (BitSize (Signed a))) => Arbitrary (Signed a)
instance (BitPack (Unsigned a), KnownNat (BitSize (Unsigned a))) => Arbitrary (Unsigned a)
